list.title: HTML
desc: Proficient in writing semantic HTML for accessibility and SEO optimization.
Familiarity with modern HTML5 tags for structuring content effectively.

list.title: CSS
desc: Advanced knowledge of CSS3, including Flexbox and Grid for responsive and fluid layouts.

list.title: JavaScript
desc: Strong command of JavaScript (ES6+), leveraging modern features.
Skillful in asynchronous programming, Promises, and async/await for efficient data handling.

list.title: TypeScript
desc: Proficient in TypeScript for static typing, enhancing code quality and developer collaboration.
Utilized TypeScript interfaces and types for clear and maintainable code.

list.title: React
desc: Proficient in creating dynamic and interactive user interfaces using React.
In-depth understanding of JSX syntax and its translation to React.createElement(tag, attrs, children).
Experience with component-based architecture, emphasizing reusability and maintainability.
Expertise in state management with React Hooks and Flux pattern for larger-scale applications.
Familiarity with React Router for efficient navigation in single-page applications.

list.title: Redux
desc: Implemented Redux for efficient state management in complex applications.
Proficient in actions, reducers, and middleware to handle application state.

list.title: Svelte
desc: Experience with Svelte, a modern JavaScript framework for building lightweight and performant web applications.
Utilized Svelte's reactive framework for efficient DOM manipulation.

list.title: Flutter
desc: Proficient in Flutter for cross-platform mobile app development.
Created engaging and responsive user interfaces with Flutter widgets.
Created open source library which is used over 100 apps.

list.title: Bundler
desc: Webpack: Utilized Webpack for bundling and managing assets, optimizing the performance of web applications.

esbuild: Familiarity with esbuild for fast and efficient bundling and minification of code.

list.title: Jest
desc: Implemented unit testing with Jest and React Testing Library for code reliability.
